review: The lag is unreal, I'm going to give it a few more days but most likely will be returning the stick.  Netflix is almost unbearable to watch, it stutters and lags about every 40 seconds.  I have 105 MBS down, so Its not a speed issue.

review: I really like the fire stick. I thought that all movies were included with prime which is not true but, overall I'm very pleased with the product.

review: What could be easier?  Plug it in and go.  Very effective.
